info.title: M365SubscriptionsClient
info.description: M365 subscriptions client provides lifecycle management features to M365 subscriptions.

get.description: Lists the M365 subscriptions. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a M365 subscription by its ID. The operation is supported for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the properties of a M365 subscription. The operation is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Request parameters that are provided to the update M365 subscription operation.

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result

Retry-After.description: Recommended time to wait before making another request to check the status of the operation. The time is specified in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Cancels a M365 subscription. The operation is supported only for billing accounts with agreement type Microsoft Customer Agreement.

Location.description: Location URI to poll for result

Retry-After.description: Recommended time to wait before making another request to check the status of the operation. The time is specified in seconds.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

SubscriptionProperties.description: The billing properties of a M365 subscription.

autoRenew.description: Indicates whether auto renewal is turned on or off for a subscription.

billingAccountId.description: The ID of the billing account to which the subscription is billed.

billingAccountDisplayName.description: The name of the billing account to which the subscription is billed.

billingProfileId.description: The ID of the billing profile to which the subscription is billed.

billingProfileDisplayName.description: The name of the billing profile to which the subscription is billed.

billingFrequency.description: The billing frequency in ISO8601 format of product in the subscription. Example: P1M, P3M, P1Y

systemOverrides.description: System imposed policies that regulate behavior of the subscription.

cancellation.description: The policy override for the subscription indicates whether the self-serve cancellation or seat reduction is allowed.

cancellationAllowedEndDate.description: The end date in UTC time by when the self-serve cancellation ends.

invoiceSectionId.description: The ID of the invoice section to which the subscription is billed.

invoiceSectionDisplayName.description: The name of the invoice section to which the subscription is billed.

nextBillingCycleDetails.description: Next billing cycle details of the subscription.

productCategory.description: Category of the subscription. Possible values include: Consumption, SaaS, AzureSupport, AzureReservationOrder, AzureSavingsPlan, Hardware, M365

productType.description: Type of the product for which the subscription is purchased

productTypeId.description: Id of the product for which the subscription is purchased

purchaseDate.description: Purchase date of the product in UTC time.

quantity.description: The number of licenses purchased for the subscription

skuDescription.description: The SKU description of the product for which the subscription is purchased.

skuId.description: The SKU ID of the product for which the subscription is purchased.

suspensionReasons.description: The suspension reason for a subscription.

termDuration.description: The duration for which you can use the subscription. Example P1Y and P1M

termStartDate.description: Start date of the term in UTC time.

termEndDate.description: End date of the term in UTC time.

NextBillingCycleDetails.description: Billing cycle details of the subscription.

billingFrequency.description: Billing frequency of the product under the subscription.

scopeParameter.name: scope
scopeParameter.description: The scope associated with M365 subscription. This includes 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}' for Billing Account scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}' for BillingProfile scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}/invoiceSections/{invoiceSectionId}' for InvoiceSection scope, 'providers/Microsoft.Billing/billingAccounts/{billingAccountId}/billingProfiles/{billingProfileId}/customers/{customerId}' for Customer scope

subscriptionNameParameter.name: subscriptionName
subscriptionNameParameter.description: The ID that uniquely identifies a subscription.
